props.name: checked
props.description: If true, the component is checked

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the checkbox will be disabled

props.name: disableRipple
props.description: If true, the ripple effect will be disabled

props.name: icon
props.description: The icon to display when the component is unchecked

props.name: checkedIcon
props.description: The icon to display when the component is checked

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the input element

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: If true, the component appears indeterminate

props.name: indeterminateIcon
props.description: The icon to display when the component is indeterminate

props.name: inputProps
props.description: Attributes applied to the input element

props.name: inputRef
props.description: Pass a ref to the input element

props.name: name
props.description: Name attribute of the input element

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the state is changed

props.name: required
props.description: If true, the input element will be required
